At 01:42 AM 04/05/01, you wrote:
>Is there a good testbed for web testing (pushing buttons, follow links
>etc)??


HttpUnit will do "black box" web testing - the kind of thing you mention. 
There's a link to it from the junit.org homepage. Cactus (at 
jakarta.apache) will do server-side unit testing.

HTH,
Jim
